00012 {
00013       jQuery( Selector ).html( '<div class="grid_waiting_message">' + ultimix.get_string( 'grid_waiting_message' ) + '</div>' );

00027 ultimix.ReloadGrid = function( Selector , Ajaxed , Url )
00028 {
00029       if( Ajaxed )
00030       {
00031             Data = ultimix.forms.ExtractFormData( Selector + ' [name=order] , ' + Selector + ' [name=reorder_field] , ' + Selector + ' [name=page]' );
00032             Options = { 'async' : false , 'replace' : true };
00033 
00034             ultimix.SetWaitingMessage( Selector );
00035             
00036             ultimix.DirectViewComposer( Selector , Data , Url , Options );
00037       }
00038       else
00039       {
00040             /* redo using data_form */
00041             jQuery( Selector ).submit();
00042       }
00043       
00044       return( false );
00045 }

00060 ultimix.Reorder = function( Selector , Ajaxed , Url , FieldName )
00061 {
00062       if( jQuery( Selector + ' [name=order]' ).val() == 'ascending' )
00063       {
00064             jQuery( Selector + ' [name=order]' ).val( 'descending' );
00065       }
00066       else
00067       {
00068             jQuery( Selector + ' [name=order]' ).val( 'ascending' );
00069       }
00070       
00071       jQuery( Selector + ' [name=reorder_field]' ).val( FieldName );
00072       
00073       ultimix.ReloadGrid( Selector , Ajaxed , Url );
00074 }

00091 ultimix.ReSetRecordsPerPage = function( Prefix , Page , FormId , FieldName , Ajaxed )
00092 {
00093       RecordsPerPage = jQuery( '#' + FormId ).find( '#' + Prefix + "_records_per_page" ).val();
00094       SetCookie( Prefix + '_records_per_page' , RecordsPerPage , 365 );
00095             
00096       if( Ajaxed )
00097       {
00098             Data = {};
00099 
00100             if( jQuery( '#' + FormId ).find( '#order' ).val() == 'ascending' )
00101             {
00102                   Data.order = 'ascending';
00103             }
00104             else
00105             {
00106                   Data.order = 'descending';
00107             }
00108 
00109             Data.reorder_field = FieldName;
00110             Data.page = Page;
00111             Data.paging_require_form = 0;
00112             
00113             ultimix.DirectViewComposer( '#' + FormId , Data , Page , { 'async' : false } );
00114       }
00115       else
00116       {
00117             if( Page )
00118             {
00119                   ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm0( false , Page );
00120             }
00121             else
00122             {
00123                   ultimix.data_form.SubmitDataForm0( false , location.href );
00124             }
00125       }
00126 }
